mods.abstract: DETAINED in the Jail of the Parish of St. John the Baptist since the 20th February a runaway boy, calling himself GUSTUS and saying to be the property of M. Alfred Davis of Natchez, Mississipi, said boy measuring 5 feet 9 inches high is about 26 years old, speaks english only and has one scar on the right part of the forehead and another one on the left part of his cheek. The owner of said slave is duly requested to claim him according to the law. NUMA TREPAGNIER. Dty Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
